reviewText: Excellent explanation about the Hispanic world and the concept of three hispanities: Spain, Spanish America, and Spanish of the US.

An incredible summary of Spanish / Latin American / South American history.  The fact that it is very complete is wonderful.  My students also found the narrator, Carlos Fuentes, to be very understandable, which is great for the students so they feel more accomplished.
I have been wishing to get this jewel since 1992... I will use it in my University teaching...  This work by Carlos Fuentes is superb for a better undertstanding of what is called "La raza csmica"

Carlos Fuentes is one of my favorite writers. He was a brilliant guy who was passionate about his country (Mexico) and the Spanish speaking world in general. This DVD provides a sweeping history the Spanish-speaking world. I give it 5 stars  (cinco estrellas).
